page.title: 01Regional Introduction
page.content: The region includes the villages of {Pengam,Tir-y-berth,Cwm-yr-allt, {Penpedairheol,Cascade,Cefn Hengoed, {Hengoed,Gelligaer,Pen-y-bryn and {Fleur-de-lys. The region has one coal mine,Penallta and a considerable amount of light industry.Most of the land is intensively managed grass land for grazing and silage production.
